info.title: transformer
info.description:
A [system](http://connections/issite/iCAF/SitePages/APIs%20-%20System%20vs%20Process%20vs%20Experience.aspx) layer API.

#### Service Functionality
Transforms a json content to xml. By default it will always transfrom from the JSON content to xml.
If there is a templateId specified then it will apply an additional xsl matching the templateId. Current implementation
only supports contentType : "JSON".

#### Sequence Diagram
![Interaction](http://connections/issite/ews/SiteAssets/api.sytem.transformer-design.png)

#### Known Implementations
* Care+ Review

#### Performance Expectation
Standard SLA applies.

#### Service Capacity Supported
Standard Capacity applies

#### Suggested Test Scenario
TBD

#### Service Availability
Standard Service Availability applies

#### Service Security
HTTPS/SSL

parameters.name: transformer-request
parameters.description: The input paramters in JSON format

200.description: Success. Transformed data as xml document.
